---
title: "WATERWOODS"
---

- A sea full of sea weed
- Main base is the [CGC's](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/Gaia/CGC.html) underwater research station where they grow and make more cyborg abyssal buttercups
- Waters fill with Horseshoe crab mutants mind controlled by the CGC, even includes a BROODING HORSESHOE CRAB MUTANT
- Other bases include:
  - Oil rig (Kraken run)
  - Shore based fish farm
  
- To make their bird house able to swim they will need to capture a rockhooper penguin like creature on a stony island
